code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import UserProfile from'../components/UserProfile';import UserActivities from'../components/UserActivities';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const{userId='1'}=useParams();const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const[activities,setActivities]=useState([]);const[userLoading,setUserLoading]=useState(true);const[activitiesLoading,setActivitiesLoading]=useState(true);const[userError,setUserError]=useState(null);const[activitiesError,setActivitiesError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchUser=async()=>{try{setUserLoading(true);const response=await axios.get("https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users/".concat(userId));setUser(response.data);}catch(error){setUserError('Failed to fetch user data');}finally{setUserLoading(false);}};const fetchActivities=async()=>{try{setActivitiesLoading(true);const response=await axios.get("https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts?userId=".concat(userId));setActivities(response.data);}catch(error){setActivitiesError('Failed to fetch activities');}finally{setActivitiesLoading(false);}};fetchUser();fetchActivities();},[userId]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserProfile,{user:user,isLoading:userLoading,error:userError}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserActivities,{activities:activities,isLoading:activitiesLoading,error:activitiesError})]});};export default Dashboard;
